title: Ninja Medium Skin Tone
description: A ninja, a covert agent or mercenary in feudal Japan, depicted in black, often with a mask and weapons. This version has a medium skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: The ninja emoji on Apple devices appears in a medium skin tone, clad in a sleek, dark suit that emphasizes stealth and agility through Apple‚Äôs characteristic smooth gradients and subtle highlights.  Its masked face, with only piercing eyes visible, conveys a sense of mystery and silent action, embodying expertise and quiet determination.  When used on Apple devices, this emoji often signifies a swift, unseen accomplishment or a hidden skill.
